description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Login', which provides a user login form with email and password inputs, handles user authentication through context, and manages navigation upon login success or failure.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing user input state, submitting login request, handling navigation on success, and displaying errors.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission: validates input, calls login function, and manages redirection or error display.
